localize.text: Oh to work in an experiment with my favorite junior; I feel unstoppable, like a tiger given wings!
Don’t be so humble. You could have gone to any Wing you wanted.
But you still chose to come here; is it because of your trust in me?
Just you wait, I’ll make sure you won’t regret your decision.
Look at this, everyone’s subconscious leads straight to death.
Everyone is forcibly locking away their own light and potential...
And here, this is the treatment I’ve told you about. The treatment for the soul.
Trust me, we’ve made a worthy first step.
People will gather around us soon enough.
I sincerely welcome you to this place.
